message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value for both parties, as it is worth $12,000 to you and represents a substantial investment for us. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $10,800 for you. This is an exceptional deal, providing you with a $1,200 discount compared to its full value. I believe this price reflects the true worth while allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
